snippet: The superintendent, Dr. Joel Klein, is retiring from a district whose school board has been accused of diverting resources to private yeshivas.
abstract: Dr Joel Klein, superintendent of East Ramapo school district in Rockland County, NY, resigns due to accusations that he funneled resources to private yeshivas; Klein had also faced mounting criticism from local community and state officials over his performance.
lead_paragraph: The superintendent, Dr. Joel Klein, is retiring from a district whose school board has been accused of diverting resources to private yeshivas.

headline.main: Superintendent Will Resign in East Ramapo District Under State Scrutiny
headline.print_headline: Schools Chief Resigns Post Amid Scrutiny of His District
